stories.headline: Driving the big CAR
stories.summary: The article discusses the integration of computer-assisted reporting (CAR) in small newsrooms, detailing steps taken by the Oshkosh Northwestern to implement CAR with limited resources.

stories.headline: Case Dismissed
stories.summary: An investigation revealing that a significant percentage of DUI cases in Indianapolis are dismissed due to police officers not showing up in court.

stories.headline: CAR specialists
stories.summary: Argues for the necessity of a CAR specialist in every newsroom, highlighting successful implementation and daily integration at the Duluth News-Tribune.
